sprint.title: Tech Stack Page v1 (Built With + Icons + Why We Chose It) — incl. Cloudflare R2
sprint.goal: Add a public /tech-stack page that showcases the full stack (including Cloudflare R2) with official icons, grouped categories, and short rationale. Keep it config-driven and easy to update.
definitionOfDone: New route /tech-stack is live and linked from footer/nav
Page shows categorized stack with icons/logos (Frontend, Backend, AI, Storage/Media, Observability, Payments, Email, Integrations)
Cloudflare R2 is included under Storage/Media with correct icon + links
Each item has: name, icon, short role, 'why used' line, and link(s) to official docs/site
Landing page includes a small 'Built with' strip linking to /tech-stack
No performance regressions (icons optimized; lazy load where needed)

stackAssumptions.assets: Prefer local SVG assets; avoid hotlinking external images

backlog.title: Define Tech Stack registry schema (config-driven) and categories

constraints: Must be easy to update without touching UI code

acceptanceTests: Adding a tool requires only config + icon asset

backlog.title: Add stack items to config (incl. Cloudflare R2) with correct categorization

constraints: Only list what is actually used in the product today

acceptanceTests: Cloudflare R2 appears on /tech-stack under Storage & Media

backlog.title: Collect official icons/logos as local assets (incl. Cloudflare) + license/source notes

assetRules: Normalize sizing/padding for consistent grid alignment
Support dark background (provide mono/white variants if needed)
compliance: Document icon sources and brand usage notes (no hotlinking)

acceptanceTests: All icons render crisp and aligned
Fallback icon shown if any icon missing

backlog.title: Build /tech-stack page UI (categorized grid + why + links)

layout: Hero section: what the page is
Category sections with grid of tool cards
Tool card: icon, name, role, why, links (Docs/Site)
constraints: Consistent icon sizing; no layout shift

acceptanceTests: All categories render correctly on mobile and desktop
Links are accessible and keyboard navigable

backlog.title: Add 'Built with' strip to landing + footer/nav link to /tech-stack

landingStrip: Show 5–6 icons (Next.js, TS, Convex, Cloudflare R2, Stripe, Sentry/Resend)
constraints: Keep it subtle; don’t clutter hero

backlog.title: SEO metadata for /tech-stack (title/description/OG)

metadata: OG/Twitter cards (reuse existing OG if available)

acceptanceTests: Correct metadata in page source and share preview

backlog.title: Performance + accessibility pass for icon-heavy page

perf: Avoid rendering huge lists without virtualization (optional)

acceptanceTests: Lighthouse a11y is strong; page remains fast

backlog.title: QA + tests (config validation + render sanity)

manualChecklist: All links open and are correct
Landing strip shows icons and links
automation: Unit: validate config shape with Zod (optional)
UI: page renders expected categories and at least N items

acceptanceTests: At least 2 tests added and passing
No broken icons or missing alt text

notes: Cloudflare R2 is included under Storage & Media; use Cloudflare brand icon for the R2 tile.
Avoid hotlinking logos; keep assets local for reliability and performance.
